title: The Inventions, Researches, and Writings of Nikola Tesla
description: An extensive collection of Tesla's works, including his groundbreaking research and inventions in the field of electricity and magnetism. This publication provides insights into his theories and patents.

title: Experiments with Alternate Currents of High Potential and High Frequency
description: A detailed paper on Tesla's experiments with alternating current (AC) and high-frequency electricity, including the development of the Tesla Coil and wireless energy transmission techniques.

title: My Inventions: The Autobiography of Nikola Tesla
description: An autobiographical account by Nikola Tesla, in which he narrates his life story, personal philosophy, and the inspirations behind his inventions and discoveries.
